column5: Great to feel the warmth of the sun and see all this snow melting knowing that open water walleye season is only 1 month away. I was at the Outdoorama in Novi Michigan talking fishing with many and hearing that they have had enough of "Old Man Winter" The Detroit River will be free of ice and the walleye bite is just around the corner. Where is everyone headed for their first open water trip?
right there in front of the salt mine beside you!!!
I hitting the Grand for Kitties
Suckers locally, only because it's close.  Then off to the Grand for cats
I really really really really want to say something about this, but i promised someone i wouldnt  Whew....that was tough.  Nice fishy Bob !!!!!  Paul
I'm going right back to my ice fishing spot on Nipissing and vertically jigging for walleye.
Home, Rainy River. Spring run here is unreal  Nice fish, whats the measurements? I'm guessing 31", around 11lbs???
hopefully beside u in the boat jiggin detroit river 'eyes, bobby! alsobe chasin kitty cats on the grand, and crappie, and perch all around! pike as soon as they open here!
Still plenty of walters to be pulled thru the hard stuff
